mapper.select: select notice_number, notice_classification, notice_title, notice_date_created from tbl_notice order by notice_number desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_notice (notice_classification, notice_title, notice_content) values(#{noticeClassification}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent})
mapper.update: update tbl_notice set notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent} where notice_number = #{noticeNumber}
mapper.select: select notice_number, notice_classification, notice_title, notice_date_created, notice_content from tbl_notice where notice_classification like CONCAT(‘%’, #{noticeClassification}, ‘%’)
select notice_number, notice_classification, notice_title, notice_date_created, notice_content from tbl_notice order by notice_date_created desc;
